content: भ्रातृ {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [भ्राज्-तृच् पृषो°; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 2. 96.</ls>] {@--1@} A brother. {@--2@} An intimate friend or relation. {@--3@} A near relative in general. {@--4@} A term of friendly address (my good friend); भ्रातः कष्टमहो <ls>Bh. 3. 37</ls>; <ls n="Bh.">2. 34</ls>; तत्त्वं चिंतय तदिदं भ्रातः <ls>Moha M. 3.</ls> {%--<ab>Dual.</ab>%} A brother and sister. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%frater%}; Zend {%bratar%}, <ab>Eng.</ab> {%brother%}.]
